content: Hi All, is there a extension in Visual Studio and/or Visual Code (or you may be aware of that's in the works)) that assist us with FHIR intellisense against configured terminology server url(s) ?

Hi All, is there an extension in Visual Studio and/or Visual Code (or you may be aware of that's in the works)) that assist us with FHIR intellisense against configured terminology server url(s) ?

Correction - extension in Visual Studio or Visual Code
i don't think so (but think it would be nice) . But there is Grahames Notepad++ Plugin: http://www.healthintersections.com.au/FhirServer/
